verbs.description: [ARG1: australia celtic winger daniel arzani] [V: set] [ARG2: for acl surgery australia winger daniel arzani] has confirmed that he requires a left knee reconstruction after sustaining a torn anterior cruciate ligament acl the injury rules arzani out of australia asian cup defense in january and the rest of the european season where he is on loan to celtic from manchester city he could be out of action for up to nine months arzani who visited a knee specialist in spain said tuesday this is a very tough time for me as i received the bad news today that i will indeed need an acl op kingdom of spain napoleonic australia daniel arzani manchester city scottish premier league dundee anterior cruciate ligament sydney spain
